title: Governance Authority

description.@value: Independent body that defines elements across the data space such as

responsibilitiesAndObligations: MUST be democratic, meaning any involved org can take part and contribute
MUST produce and recommend open standards, protocols, building blocks
MUST produce and recommend recommendations in compliance with DSSC
MUST make the rules it recommends publicly available in machine readable format
CAN propose reference and compliant implementations of building blocks
CAN propose audits and certifications to ensure compliance with the set recommendations
CAN NOT be any other role
